text: U bi sond! Me ji Musa ra pirtuk (Tewrat) daye u me li pey wi da pexember xistine peyrewe wi u me ji bona Isaye kure Meryeme ra beratene daveker dane u me Isa bi cane piroz deye hez kirine. Idi qey ke gave pexemberek hatibe bal we; bi wan beratene ku can we ne xwestibe, hun doza mezinaye nakin? Idi hun; desteki ji wan pexemberan didine derewderandine u hun desteki ji nakujin
